0.title: Congressional Districting Plan
0.description: Establishing the composition of the eight districts in the State of Maryland for the election of members to the United States House of Representatives; requiring that a certain question be submitted to the qualified voters of the State if the Act is petitioned to referendum under Article XVI of the Maryland Consitution; etc.

2.title: Montgomery County - Board of Education Residence Districts - Redistricting Plan MC 01-21SS
2.description: Altering the boundaries of the residence districts for the Montgomery County Board of Education.

3.title: Carroll County - County Commissioner Districts - Redistricting Plan
3.description: Altering the boundaries for the county commissioner districts in Carroll County.

4.title: State Commission on Criminal Sentencing Policy - Plea Agreements and Annual Report (The Judicial Transparency Act of 2021)
4.description: Providing that a sentence imposed under a plea agreement may not be determined to be compliant with certain sentencing guidelines unless the sentence falls within the actual sentencing guidelines range; and requiring a certain report submitted to the General Assembly by January 31 each year by the State Commission on Criminal Sentencing Policy to identify certain information for crimes of violence.

5.title: Crimes - Firearms - Penalties and Procedures (Violent Firearms Offender Act of 2021)
5.description: Expanding the types of cases in which the State may appeal from a decision of a trial court under certain circumstances; establishing, altering, and clarifying penalties for and elements of certain firearm-related crimes; prohibiting a District Court commissioner from authorizing the pretrial release of a certain defendant charged with a certain firearm-related crime under certain circumstances; etc.

9.title: Carroll County – County Commissioner Districts – Redistricting Plan
9.description: Altering the boundaries for the county commissioner districts in Carroll County.

10.title: State Commission on Criminal Sentencing Policy – Plea Agreements and Annual Report (The Judicial Transparency Act of 2021)
10.description: Providing that a sentence imposed under a plea agreement may not be determined to be compliant with certain sentencing guidelines unless the sentence falls within the actual sentencing guidelines range; and requiring a certain report submitted to the General Assembly by January 31 each year by the State Commission on Criminal Sentencing Policy to identify certain information for crimes of violence.

12.title: Motor Fuel Tax Rates – Consumer Price Index Adjustment – Repeal
12.description: Repealing a requirement that certain motor fuel tax rates be adjusted in future years based on growth in the Consumer Price Index for All Urban Consumers.
